name: Jukka K. Nurminen
content: Jukka K Nurminen - University of Helsinki Jukka K Nurminen Professor of Computer Science Professor, Department of Computer ScienceSupervisor for doctoral programme, Doctoral Programme in Computer Science﻿﻿﻿EUROFusion Advanced Computing Hub FinlandEmpirical Software Engineering research group https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5083-1927 Phone+358294151155, +358504836442Emailjukka.k.nurminenhelsinkifi PL 68 (Pietari Kalmin katu 5)00014Finland 1988 …2025 Research activity per year Personal profile Description of research and teachingLinkedIn: https://fi.linkedin.com/in/jukka-k-nurminen-6b0b6a1 Publications in Google Scholar https://scholar.google.fi/citations?user=cmftgn4AAAAJ Interests I am widely interested in the performance of efficient software systems and their construction. My most influential past work has been on energy-efficient software as well as on mobile peer-to-peer and cloud solutions. Currently, my main interests are on tools and techniques for developing data-intensive software systems. This includes testing of AI systems, technical solutions for ethical decision making as well as software development for new computational platforms like for quantum computers and for highly distributed edge computing. Recruiting, acquiring funding, and managing a research team. Leading EU, EIT, and TEKES funded international research projects and CERN cooperation. Organizer of hackathons, summer schools, and workshops. Coauthor of over 100 scientific publications. H-index 33. Acquired over 1 MEUR research funding.
